Q:
打丁有損健康？

A:
根據專家意見，打丁有三大好處:
1. 促進肌肉生長
- 多項研究(註1)顯示長期打丁促進雄性激素分泌(e.g. 睾丸素)(註2)， 睾丸素可促進肌肉蛋白合成，並降低肌肉蛋白分解 (註3)，促進肌肉生長。

2. 促進骨骼生長，預防骨質疏鬆
- 雄性激素分泌增加骨質鈣化，增加骨質密度 (註4)。 另外，雄性激素分泌增加同時導致雌激素上升 (註5)， 雌激素對骨質有多項防護作用，例如促進腎臟製造維他命D3、 延長骨細胞壽命以及抑制破骨細胞生成以預防骨質分解 (註6)。

3. 促進心理健康
- 長期缺乏打丁會增加抑制性神經傳遞物質分泌 (註7)，而定期打丁可透過刺激大腦以促進下丘腦垂體性腺功能 (註8)，可能有抗壓和抗抑鬱作用。

Q:
打丁導致腎虧?

A:
目前並冇客觀證據證明兩者關係。理論上， 雄性激素增加會促進腎臟製造骨化三醇(即維他命D3)同埋促紅細胞生長素(註9)，可能會增加腎臟負荷。另外，亦有可能增加高血壓同冠心病風險(註10)。

Q:
即係打定唔打好？

A:
每1-3日打1次都冇問題， 記得攝取足夠蛋白質同鈣質。

Q:
戒為良藥？戒左增加自信、易d出pool？

A:
A0 dead打唔打丁永遠都係A0 dead，係改變唔得(基於愛情經濟學中嘅機會成本理論)(註11)


註釋(純粹背後科學原理同參考資料，有錯歡迎指正):
1.https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11760788/

2. Androgen secretion is raised, including direct production of testosterone by Leydig cells of testis and conversion of testosterone to dihydrotestosterone (DHT) by 5a-reductase

3. Testosterone promotes protein anabolism, thus enhancing myoprotein production from amino acids (alanine especially)

4. Androgens promote bone mineralization and increase bone mineral density (BMD)

5. Estrogen is converted from androgen by aromatase (e.g. testosterone in testis to estradiol, androstenedione in zona reticularis of adrenal cortex to estrone)

6. Estrogen promotes action of renal 1a-hydroxylase to produce 1,25-hydroxyvitaminD3(calcitriol), as well as prolonging survival of osteocytes and osteoblasts. Furthermore, estrogen suppresses osteoclastogenesis, preventing bone resorption.

7. Inhibitory neurotransmitter such as GABA

8. Excitatory neurotransmitter stimulates the hypothalamic-pituitary-gonad (HPG) axis

9. Testosterone promotes renal synthesis of calcitriol and erythropoietin

10. Testosterone increases plasma LDL/HDL ratio, increasing risk of atherosclerosis and related diseases (myocardial infarction and arterial thrombosis)

11. https://lih.kg/2053375

戒為良藥？戒左增加自信、易d出pool？

A:
A0 dead打唔打丁永遠都係A0 dead，係改變唔得(基於愛情經濟學中嘅機會成本理論)(註11)


註釋(純粹背後科學原理同參考資料，有錯歡迎指正):
1.https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11760788/

2. Androgen secretion is raised, including direct production of testosterone by Leydig cells of testis and conversion of testosterone to dihydrotestosterone (DHT) by 5a-reductase

3. Testosterone promotes protein anabolism, thus enhancing myoprotein production from amino acids (alanine especially)

4. Androgens promote bone mineralization and increase bone mineral density (BMD)

5. Estrogen is converted from androgen by aromatase (e.g. testosterone in testis to estradiol, androstenedione in zona reticularis of adrenal cortex to estrone)

6. Estrogen promotes action of renal 1a-hydroxylase to produce 1,25-hydroxyvitaminD3(calcitriol), as well as prolonging survival of osteocytes and osteoblasts. Furthermore, estrogen suppresses osteoclastogenesis, preventing bone resorption.

7. Inhibitory neurotransmitter such as GABA

8. Excitatory neurotransmitter stimulates the hypothalamic-pituitary-gonad (HPG) axis

9. Testosterone promotes renal synthesis of calcitriol and erythropoietin

10. Testosterone increases plasma LDL/HDL ratio, increasing risk of atherosclerosis and related diseases (myocardial infarction and arterial thrombosis)

11. https://lih.kg/2053375
